thread.title: Spotted: Jose Mourinho gives young fan special gift as Man United arrive home after win
thread.title_full: Spotted: Jose Mourinho gives young fan special gift as Man United arrive home after win

title: Spotted: Jose Mourinho gives young fan special gift as Man United arrive home after win
text:
1 of 15 A lucky fan received Jose Mourinho's travel pillow as Man United arrive home 
The Red Devils landed at Manchester Airport on Wednesday evening following their 1-0 win over Saint-Etienne at the Stade Geoffroy-Guichard. 
Henrikh Mkhitaryan bagged the only goal of the game as United triumphed 4-0 on aggregate, although Mourinho will be worried about injuries to the goalscorer and Michael Carrick . 
However, the 54-year-old boss wasn't too preoccupied to ignore waiting fans outside the terminal, and even gave one a precious souvenir. 
Scroll through the gallery above to see the best pictures as Manchester United arrive home after their Europa league win in France. Related articles
